Meinberg LANTIME-M320-GPS-AD10 Network Time Server with high-precision GPS reference and advanced network management features.
Key Features: - 19" 1U rackmount enclosure - High-performance NTP server with hardware timestamping - GPS reference receiver with integrated antenna - Dual redundant power supplies (AC and DC) - Integrated GNSS receiver (GPS, GLONASS, Galileo, BeiDou) - Multiple network interfaces (10/100/1000 Mbit) - Comprehensive security features - IPv4 and IPv6 support - Web-based management interface - Advanced monitoring and alerting - PTP (IEEE 1588) support - Oscillator options: TCXO, OCXO, Rubidium - Hot-swappable components - Modular system architecture - SNMP v2/v3 support - Serial console port - Reference time output options (PPS, 10MHz)

Standard datacenter-grade equipment designed for controlled environments. Not specifically designed for chemical exposure.
Internal components protected by metal chassis. Standard ESD protection for electronic components.
Device should be installed in controlled environments free from corrosive gases or liquids.

CE Mark RoHS Compliant WEEE Compliant EN 55032 Class A (Emissions) EN 55035 (Immunity) EN 61000-3-2 (Harmonic Current Emissions) EN 61000-3-3 (Voltage Fluctuations and Flicker) FCC Part 15 Subpart B, Class A IEC 60950-1 / EN 60950-1 Safety EN 62368-1 Safety MTBF > 100,000 hours

Designed for installation in controlled data center and telecommunications environments.
Internal high-stability oscillator (OCXO or Rubidium option) requires stable temperature environment for optimal performance.
Active cooling system with temperature monitoring and automatic fan speed control ensures reliable operation within the specified temperature range.
Internal holding time after loss of reference signal depends on oscillator option: - TCXO: ±1.5×10⁻⁶ per day - OCXO: ±5×10⁻¹⁰ per day - Rubidium: ±5×10⁻¹¹ per day
Time server provides internal environmental monitoring with SNMP traps for temperature and humidity threshold violations.
Built-in watchdog system monitors internal operational parameters and can trigger automatic alerts and recovery procedures.
GPS antenna requires outdoor installation with clear view of the sky, connected via provided antenna cable (up to 100m).
